resources.string: Sportify
Head and Smith dominate India on day one! India won the toss but not much else during three challenging sessions at The Oval
Chameera\'s four leads bowlers\' party as SL wrap up series! He was helped by Hasaranga and Kumara, before a blazing Nissanka crushed Afghanistan
Ehantharajah: Moeen returns not as Mr Right, but Mr Right Now He might flunk. He might thrive. It could be galling. It could be glorious.
King, Charles star as West Indies clinch ODI series.Hosts were reduced to 95 for 5, after Smith\'s cameo helped visitors past 300
How many Tests in England have not featured the England team? And how many times has a bowler gone wicketless in the first innings and taken a five-for in the second innings of his debut Test?
MUCHOVA STUNNED ARYNA. IS IGA NEXT? After a thrilling Thursday, Roland Garros will crown a three-time champion, or a maiden major winner.
Novak Djokovic to play for 23rd major title after breaking down cramping Carlos Alcaraz at Roland Garros

Tkachuk\'s playoff heroics for Panthers recall OT goal in Memorial Cup
Gudas contributing more to Panthers\' Cup run than big beard, physicality
Bedard says going No. 1 to Blackhawks in 2023 Draft would be \'huge honor\'
Roy wants to coach in NHL again, but is at peace with emotional past
Golden Knights, Panthers each feel good about path to Stanley Cup win>

Aaron Gordon gets his statement performance to put Nuggets on brink of title!! The 27-year-old forward has one of the more complete games in his Nuggets tenure, leading Denver in a career-defining moment.
BOSTON – Celtics forward Grant Williams today underwent successful surgery to repair a tear of the radial collateral ligament of the 3rd metacarpo-phalangeal joint on his left hand.

Jayson Tatum sets Game 7 record with 51 points as Celtics overpower Sixers!! Two weeks after Stephen Curry scores 50 against Sacramento in Game 7, Tatum breaks his mark to lead Boston into the Eastern Conference finals.
5 takeaways from Celtics\' series-saving Game 6 victory over Sixers. Marcus Smart keeps Boston\'s heartbeat alive until Jayson Tatum takes over late in the 4th quarter to force a Game 7.
2023 NBA Finals Schedule. Get the latest series matchups, schedules and broadcast information for the entire 2023 NBA playoffs.

Patrick Cantlay dismisses slow play criticism | \'We were waiting all day\'
Jon Rahm claimed a four-shot victory over Brooks Koepka and Phil Mickelson at The Masters, his second major title
Jon Rahm came through a Sunday tussle with Brooks Koepka to claim a dominant four-stroke victory and secure a return to world No 1 at The Masters.
Brooks Koepka carded rounds of 65 and 67 over the first two days to top the leaderboard at The Masters, where victory would give him his fifth major title and first since joining LIV
Vikings officially release four-time Pro Bowl RB Dalvin Cook
Free-agent WR DeAndre Hopkins to visit Patriots next week

Eagles QB Jalen Hurts is ready to start 2023 season after Super Bowl appearance: \'Last year is over\'

Saudi Arabia, Aramco to buy Al-Nassr, Cristiano Ronaldo\'s football club
Moment to say goodbye to football: Zlatan Ibrahimovic retires at 41
David Moyes is expected to stay on as West Ham manager after talks with owner David Sullivan on Friday.

Kone, Barella, Thuram and more: Who Liverpool will target next? With Alexis Mac Allister signed, Liverpool will now move their focus on to other midfielder targets - but who would fit the Reds\' system the best?
